1.title: Something Kelly!
1.plot: Designer Kelly is getting married and shocks Sam by revealing SHE is the bride looking for a dress! Sam is especially keen to help, but so is guest designer Heidi Elnora, who helps update Kelly's borrowed dress. The question is, can Kelly give up control?

2.title: Bride Gone Wild
2.plot: Tomboy Christie wants to be able to play football in her dress on her big day, which doesn't work with the flouncy sleeves on Mom's dress. Sam and Kelly will have to come up with something special, as this bride is a one-off!

3.title: Southern Barbie Bride
3.plot: Jessica is a shy southern belle from North Carolina, but Mom is a Dixie diva with big style, big personality, and loves bling! Sam and Kelly must find the common ground to please this reserved bride and her fun-loving mom.

4.title: Fashion or Family?
4.plot: Opinionated bride Stephanie wants a jaw-dropping wedding dress, but her equally opinionated Mom insists there is none more jaw dropping than her own. Kelly needs to work magic to appease both parties, while Sam has to find a gown fit for a drama queen.

5.title: Bride of Liberace
5.plot: Bubbly Karlee's wedding is a mix of Great Gatsby, Marie Antoinette and Liberace. Mom's dress is far from those, but she doesn't see why Karlee wouldn't want to wear it as is. Kelly and Sam have their work cut out making both Karlee and Mom happy.

6.title: From Active Duty to Bridal Beauty
6.plot: Crystal is a tough soldier who doesn't believe in the bridal moment and isn't used to wearing dresses. Sam must find a way to make Crystal a bridal believer, while Kelly has to transform Grandma's dress into something fit for a snow queen.

7.title: Beauty & the Beach
7.plot: Dreaming of Jaime wearing her wedding dress got Mom through some rough times, but Jaime can't wear the aged dress as is. To give it a chance, Kelly must revitalize Mom's gown, while Sam has to find a flowy dress fit for Jaime's Hawaiian beach wedding.

8.title: Wedding Belles
8.plot: Olivia Kate is a Southern bride who wants a dress to rival Kate Middleton's. However, Mom wants to pass down the dress Grandma made for her, and it's more 'Princess Di'. Kelly must update this 1980s gown, while Sam has to find a dress worthy of royalty!

9.title: From Country Cotton to Beachy Bling
9.plot: Jennipher has just four weeks to find the beachy ball gown of her dreams. Mom has supplied her with her flowerchild dress, but it is not a ball gown, and too small to even try on. Can Kelly transform Mom's dress, or will Sam provide what Jennipher wants?

10.title: I Want to Be Buried in This Dress
10.plot: Amber Joi is a beautiful bride who is looking for a gown that will match her regal venue. Mom's dress, handmade by her husband's grandmother, is just not glam enough, but can Kelly update it to something that is? Or will Sam find her the perfect gown?

11.title: From Yee-haw to Vavavoom!
11.plot: Amy is a mom, but doesn't want to look like one at her wedding. Her own Mom's dress is far from sexy, even including a 'bridal cowboy hat'! Kelly must turn it into a dream dress with vavavoom, while Sam needs to find something with class for the wedding.

12.title: I'm Not a Frumpy Milkmaid!
12.plot: Paloma is from a big traditional Italian family, looking for a wedding full of glam, straight from the 1950's - but her mom's dress screams 1980's. Will it be Sam or Kelly who succeeds in finding the timeless dress for this sparkling bride?

13.title: Tiny Bride, Big Problems
13.plot: Petite bride Marcy has been searching for a wedding dress for 8 months, to no avail! She is sentimental about Mom's gown, but worries that after taking so long to decide, nothing may match her expectations. Sam is convinced he can make her mind up.

14.title: Damn You, Sexy Dress!
14.plot: Spicy Latina bride Susan wants to sparkle on her wedding day. Mom hopes Susan will wear her handmade gown that was rescued from Honduras, but Kelly will need to add a lot of sex appeal first. Or will Sam be able to add something picante into the mix?

15.title: Bridal Muscle Show
15.plot: Cat wants a dress that will show off her body-builder physique, but her mother-in-law wants her to cover up with a conservative 1980s gown, which tears when Cat flexes her muscles. Kelly and Sam will struggle to find a dress that won't reveal too much!

16.title: Love on a List
16.plot: Sheena has a Type-A personality. She likes to-do lists and even met her fiancé on the Internet so that she could check off all of her requirements. Wearing mom's flashy dress is definitely not on her list. Sam and Kelly have a hard task ahead of them!

17.title: My Big Fat Persian Wedding
17.plot: Rameneh is having a grand Persian wedding and her dress cannot be outdone by her guests! Dad picked out Mom's gown on his own, but can Kelly transform it into Rameneh's dream dress, or will Sam find her a new dress that will blow away the guests?

18.title: Here Comes the Groom
18.plot: Sally and her fiancé are from the Midwest and do everything together, even wedding dress shopping. They've always been on the same page, but Chas is starting to have questions, and he might not like the answers!

19.title: Bling vs. Sibling
19.plot: Sisters Alysha and Jen have very different tastes, but both are soon to wed, and both are set on wearing mom's dress down the aisle! Will Sam and Kelly be able to satisfy what each bride wants, or will the final choice split these two apart?

20.title: The Not-So-Princess Bride
20.plot: Travelling the world as a character actor, Jamie wants a dress that is 100% 'her' for her wedding. Mom is happy to be bonding with her daughter after so many missed years, and now hopes Jamie will wed in her lacey gown, but will she prefer something new?

1.title: The Bride Who Won't Decide
1.plot: Dad thinks he's found the prefect dress when bride Jaime tries on her mom's 35-year-old gown. But Mom thinks Jaime deserves a dress all of her own and just wants her to finally make a decision after 7 months of shopping.

2.title: Don't Mess with the Latin Juju
2.plot: For curvy Latina bride Maricela, family comes above all. But with Kelly and Sam's guidance and expertise, she finds herself torn between a dress filled with tradition, and one that makes her feel like a new woman.

3.title: Smother of the Bride
3.plot: Lauren has always tried to please her mom and now must learn to stand on her own. Mom is set on passing her own gown along, while Lauren's entourage remains open to a new dress. The decision is all Lauren's if she can find her voice among the crowd.

4.title: A 1913 Dress for a 2013 Bride
4.plot: Karina is a working mom of two who hasn't had time to be a bride. She's looking for a form-fitting dress that has some spice! With only three months left, Mom has offered up her modest, puffy-sleeved gown - but will sentiment be enough to win Karina over?

5.title: A Blogger's Bridal Bliss
5.plot: Bridgette is a popular bridal blogger. Her gown must impress family, friends, and her many readers. She lost her father as a teen and her mother would love to honor his memory by seeing Bridgette say "I do" in the dress and coat she wore to their wedding.

6.title: Dad's Bride and Joy
6.plot: Med Student Gina wants to look and feel perfect on her wedding day. Her Dad suggests she wear a modest heirloom passed down from generations. Gina appreciates the sentimental value but craves modern options. It's a tough call for this analytical bride.

7.title: Bridal Culture Clash
7.plot: Jasmine is a young bride dying to flaunt her curves on her big day. Her devout Muslim Mom has a very different idea of the perfect dress, while Jasmine's rocker sister has offbeat opinions of her own. This bride finds herself more torn than ever expected.

8.title: Everyone's Got an Opinion
8.plot: Katherine is planning her wedding in NYC and wants a gown as posh as her surroundings. Her Mother and several relatives are pressuring her to choose a 70-year-old family heirloom dress. Can Katherine balance big city dreams and her family's expectations?

9.title: Burlesque Bride
9.plot: Despite her family's plea, Aisha insists on wearing a vivid red gown to match her Burlesque theme. Her future sister-in-law has offered up her own designer gown to be dyed. Sam and Kelly have their work cut out for themselves and big surprises are ahead!

10.title: Bridal Runaround
10.plot: Jenny is a finicky bride who knows everything she doesn't want. Dozens of dresses later, she's yet to feel that "AH!" moment. Her mother is hoping a sentimental, custom gown all the way from Taiwan will win Jenny over. Pleasing this bride is no easy feat!

11.title: Bridal Cover Up
11.plot: Conservative bride Lauren wants a gown as modest as it is grand. Her mother's knit tank dress certainly has her covered, but it's not the dress of her dreams. Can Lauren hold her ground when family and friends urge her to choose a more revealing gown?

12.title: Cling-on Mom
12.plot: Newly-confident Courtney has lost over 100 pounds and wants to show off her new body! There's just one thing standing in the way, her persistent mother, who will be devastated if Courtney doesn't choose the gown both she and Courtney's grandmother wore.

13.title: A Bride's Right to Bear Arms
13.plot: Monika dreams of a long-sleeved dress, which makes Sam's search difficult. She is close to Kathleen, her mother-in-law to be and coincidentally, Kathleen's 70's gown fits the bill. She offers it to Monika, but this nice gesture may prove more complicated.

14.title: Dazed and I Do's
14.plot: Nina and her Mom are as close as can be. With Nina's upcoming wedding, Mom is having a hard time accepting that she's growing up and moving out. Mom's puffy-sleeved, tea-length, 80's gown is a tough sell for anyone, especially this subdued young bride.

1.title: The Blinged-Out Jersey Bride
1.plot: Jersey bride Nikki is planning a big Italian wedding with a winter wonderland theme! She's dying to flaunt her assets in a skin-tight, crystal covered dress, but Mom thinks her own 80's gown is the best choice. Can Sam and Kelly satisfy this flashy bride?

2.title: Daddy's Girl
2.plot: Sarah is a self-proclaimed Daddy's girl, who actually wants to wear her grandma's dress. However, the 1942 wedding gown is extremely delicate and now falling apart. Can Kelly save the dress and the day - or will Sam sway Sarah with an unexpected new gown?

3.title: Can You Drop It Like It's Hot?
3.plot: Vivacious Terron knows what she wants: a royal wedding and a body-hugging gown to match! Her mother's dress, handmade by her aunt, doesn't fit the bill and makes her feel... like a 'sausage'. Kelly and Sam have their hands full with this outspoken bride!

4.title: Maybe I Won't Pay for the Wedding!
4.plot: Doctor Erika is a bride who isn't typically emotional when making decisions. Having not tried on any wedding dresses her Mom is adamant on Erika wearing her 1970's gown. Unexpected emotions surface and Erika is torn between her head and her heart.

5.title: Tall Order Bride
5.plot: Bridget is 6-feet tall and her prison guard Mom has firm views on modesty with no problem expressing it! The family dress was worn by Bridget's Mom and Grandma, so pressure to keep tradition alive is on! Kelly and Sam are "under the gun" with this bride!

6.title: This Dress Kicks Your Dress to the Curb
6.plot: Karina is a working mom of two who hasn't had time to be a bride. She's looking for a form-fitting dress that has some spice! With only three months left, Mom has offered up her modest, puffy-sleeved gown - but will sentiment be enough to win Karina over?

7.title: If the Gown Fits
7.plot: Curvy bride Audrey is planning a Candyland wedding and wants a dress with a crazy skirt! She's been too self-conscious to try anything on and Mom's 80's gown doesn't instill much confidence either. Can Audrey find a dress that reveals her inner bombshell?

8.title: The 007 Bride
8.plot: Krystal is planning a 007-themed wedding on a yacht! She wants a knockout gown to match her flashy theme and venue. Her Mom was married in 2003 and would love for Krystal to wear her conservative dress. Can Sam and Kelly find a sexy yet demure balance?

9.title: Mom's Pride and Joi
9.plot: Joi is proud of her Filipino culture, but Mom's 1960's coronation-wedding gown is over the top and literally weighs her down! She pictures herself in something more Sex and the City-esque. Can Joi find balance between her heritage & her inner fashionista?

10.title: That Wow Factor!
10.plot: Katie loves the idea of wearing mom's dress for her Valentine's Day wedding, but the gown itself isn't what she ever envisioned. Kelly is determined to make Katie's dream a reality, but Sam surprises everyone with what he can find on a limited budget!

11.title: The Young and the Dress-less
11.plot: Young Hayden is marrying her high school sweetheart. She wants a fitted dress with sleeves, to abide by her church rules. Mom has always guided Hayden's decisions, and her 1992 puffy-sleeved gown fits the bill! But Hayden must make this choice on her own.

12.title: Best Stressed Bride
12.plot: With a wedding 6 weeks away, time's ticking for Southern bride Ansley! She's dreamt of wearing mom and grandma's gown but the 70-year-old dress doesn't feel as magical as she once remembered. Will her fairytale live or will Ansley start her own tradition?

13.title: I Feel Like a Ghost Bride
13.plot: For fashion-forward Heather, Mom's billowy 1970s dress feels like a step backwards. Heather turns to her best friend Kim for help, but Kim has her own opinions! Between Mom and maid of honor, can Heather find a gown that satisfies everyone - AND herself?

14.title: Whose Sari Now?
14.plot: Bride Sharon is marrying her Indian fiancé, Vijay. She is Vijay's first girlfriend and eager to please him and his family. She's hoping an Indian-fusion dress may win them over. Sam and Kelly definitely have a huge challenge with this bride!

15.title: With This Bling, I Thee Wed
15.plot: Jennipher has just four weeks to find the beachy ball gown of her dreams. Mom has supplied her with her flowerchild dress, but it is not a ball gown, and too small to even try on. Can Kelly transform Mom's dress, or will Sam provide what Jennipher wants?

16.title: This Bride Was Made for Dancing
16.plot: Krista has tried on over 50 gowns and with a wedding two months away, time's ticking! Mom thinks her 70s chiffon dress is perfect, but it literally overwhelms Krista. Can Sam find an off-the-rack gown in time? Or will Kelly's new ideas win everyone over?

17.title: Say Less to the Dress
17.plot: Kayla hopes that wearing her mom's dress will strengthen their relationship but the ruffled 80s gown isn't exactly the simple dress she wants. The pressure is on for Kelly and Sam to deliver not only a winning gown, but to create a bonding experience too.

18.title: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Dress
18.plot: A family tradition was born when Kara's older sister wore her mother's wedding dress. Now, the ball's in Kara's court and she isn't exactly in love with the 70s turned 90s dress. Will Kelly - or Sam - be able to turn this bride's fears to cheers?

19.title: Torn Between Two Mothers
19.plot: Anna's adoptive mom Pam is set on her daughter wearing the dress she handmade herself. Anna's birth mom Crystal thinks she'd be happier in something new and sexy. Caught between two mothers, Anna's decision comes down to more than just choosing a gown.

20.title: Dress Reversal
20.plot: Alexis is marrying a pro-baseball player and wants to turn heads at their beachfront wedding. Mom thinks she has just the gown, but it's older than Alexis herself. Dad thinks Alexis will be happier in something new... just don't ask him about the bill!

imdb.title: Something Borrowed, Something New
plot: Brides to be are confused if they should wear their mothers wedding gown or buy a new one. This show makes the brides choose between something borrowed or something new.::Nour Baroud
